1.0.name: wordpress/short-syntax-highlighter
1.0.description:
Short Syntax Highlighter allows you to easily post syntax-highlighted code to your site without losing it's formatting or making any manual changes. Without adding any JS or css file in your theme.
This plugin will help you to highlight the code systax. digcms.com

Tested upto 3.0.3

Functionality

This plugin will help you to highlight the code systax.
